thread.title: Torri Zeigler

author: Torri Zeigler
title: Torri Zeigler
text: Was ordering my chairs online and saw the delivery date was outside of the window that I expected...I was told by a friend who had ordered from here before that they shipped pretty quickly and the chairs I had chosen was on a 10-12 week delivery date..so I called to see if this was true and got connected to Alex. I am so glad I called and spoke to him as I was ordering the wrong chair and he guided me in the right direction!! After hearing what I wanted he immediately hooked me up and believe it or not the whole process took less than appx 5 minutes!! Alex was so professional yet laid back and patient with my questions! He has also promised to follow through with me as soon as my chairs arrive! Like I said, I'm so glad I called!! Good job Alex, I look forward to getting my new awesome chairs!!
